title: Plat 1 Support LF Team
body:
Hey, my name is Rain, or Smoothie, whatever you prefer. I am a support main, I can play just about any support except Alistar and Bard. 

I've been looking for a serious team for a while, and can't seem to find any beyond silver/gold, so if you're willing to have me on board, message me in game.

Cheers.
